relevant_findings.ENT: OP clear, no lesions, no JVD, neck supple
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: +s1, s2; no m/r/g; no peripheral edema; 2+ dp/pt bilaterally
relevant_findings.abdomen: soft, very tender LUQ just superior to catheter insertion site; no distension, no rebound/guarding; +bs; catheter site without erythema; dark brownish output from biliary drain
relevant_findings.musculoskeletal: strength throughout; no joint swelling; no cyanosis or clubbing
relevant_findings.neurological: cn grossly intact; no focal deficits
relevant_findings.skin: no rashes; port-a-cath visible in right upper chest; site non-tender
